name: strava-segments-to-nfts-dapp
description: Decentralized application aiming to generate an NFT for each new unique and eligible segment a Strava user runs through.
author: Alain Nicolas

scripts.migrate:dashboard: truffle migrate --network dashboard && npm run update
scripts.migrate:goerli: truffle migrate --network goerli && npm run update
scripts.migrate:linea: truffle migrate --network linea && npm run update
scripts.migrate:local: truffle migrate --network development && npm run update
scripts.migrate:sepolia: truffle migrate --network sepolia && npm run update
